response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, we propose an offer of $1,300,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its market value but also the strategic advantage it offers to your operations. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Should you require any further information or discuss the specifics, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1300000}
